snippet: Mr. de Blasio and Mr. Lhota are having an argument about whether Mr. Lhota shares the views of the national Republican party. Mr. de Blasio says he does; Mr. Lhota says he doesn’t.
abstract: Mr. de Blasio and Mr. Lhota are having an argument about whether Mr. Lhota shares the views of the national Republican party. Mr. de Blasio says he does; Mr. Lhota says he doesn’t.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
